isEntityRegistered.conditionString: Confirm the correct legal entity and company status (Must be registered)- Check ASIC

noNilCreditLimitIssued.conditionString: No Nil credit limits issued by other insurers in our database - TCR Portal

checkForGSTRegistration.conditionString: ABR check to confirm GST registration - ABN Lookup

entityIncorporated.conditionString: Make sure the company has been incorporated for at least 12 months - ASIC

courtCharges.conditionString: No court actions or legal or collection activity present above a maximum of $5,000

noAdverse.conditionString: No adverse against director/s, owner/s or Shareholders

soleTraderNotRegistered.conditionString: Sole Traders not registered for GST can be approved for $20K if they have been operating for longer than 2 years
